001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.concurrent;
002
003import java.util.concurrent.Semaphore;
004import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
005
006/**
007 * Will interrupt waiting threads on close. Useful for publishers that use semaphores to wait for sufficient requests.
008 */
009public class CloseableSemaphore
010        extends Semaphore
011        implements AutoCloseable {
012    private volatile boolean isClosed;
013
014    public CloseableSemaphore(int permits) {
015        super(permits);
016    }
017
018    public CloseableSemaphore(int permits, boolean fair) {
019        super(permits, fair);
020    }
021
022    @Override
023    public boolean tryAcquire(long timeout, TimeUnit unit) throws InterruptedException {
024        if (isClosed)
025            throw new InterruptedException("Closed");
026
027        return super.tryAcquire(timeout, unit);
028    }
029
030    @Override
031    public void close() {
032        isClosed = true;
033        for (Thread queuedThread : getQueuedThreads()) {
034            queuedThread.interrupt();
035        }
036    }
037}
